page.title: 02ATTITUDES
page.content:
ATTITUDES ARE MIXED WITH PEOPLE LIVING IN THE AREA WHO HAVE LIVED THERE FOR YEARS AND WITH THOSE WHO HAVE JUST MOVED INTO THE COUNTRY TO RETIRE OR TO BUY PROPERTY WHICH IS LESS EXPENSIVE AS IT IS IN THIS PART OF THE COUNTRY. ALSO AS MORE EXPANSION TAKES PLACE IN THE CITY OF PETERBOROUGH MORE PEOPLE ARE MOVING OUT TO OUR AREA. THE ATTITUDES BEING MIXED ARE MAYBE BEST STATED BY THE PEOPLE OF THE AREA SO HERE I WILL QUOTE SOME OF THE RESIDENTS OWN WORDS ON THEIR ATTITUDES TO LIVING IN THIS AREA IN THE 1980's.
MR AND MRS REED THINK LIVING IN THE 1980's IN THIS AREA IS 'FANTASTIC'. WHILST MR JUDGE AND HIS WIFE ARE CONCERNED ABOUT THE ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL STATE OF THE COUNTRY.
